name: Welcome A'Bored...
description:
Welcome A-bored! You are discovering the new place you’re going to stay for a while. You’re joining a submarine station, but in the deep sea, there is not so much to do. Or is there? Your main goal is to find some exciting things to do and survive your first mission in the abyss. Try not to break your ship, starve to death or.. Die of Boredom! Good luck!

Credits : 
Arthur REITER, Axel GAUTHIER, Cédric MARTIN, Enzo MORETTO, Laëtitia HUGOT
